t: I've been an Amazon SDE and an Amazon SDM. I enjoyed my time as an SDE, luckily ... | Hacker News
s: Generally, Amazon has two minds about performance management. In written documentation, it's all about whether your reports meet the role guidelines. The written documentation is solid. They share how to evaluate people objectively and how to minimize bias. Verbally, it's all about numbers ...

t: Why do Amazon SDMs get paid more as compared to SDEs at the same level (L5 or L6)? - Quora
s: Answer: At least when I worked there (3 years ago), the target pay for an SDE was higher than that of an SDM - though the SDM’s on average made more simply because the SDEs who moved into management roles tended to have already proven that they were strong contributors/leaders, and so already ...
